name: dart-isolate
comment:
Concurrent programming using isolates: independent workers that are similar to threads but don't share memory, communicating only via messages.

See also: dart:isolate - Concurrency with Isolates in the library tour.

class.name: Capability
class.preview: An unforgeable object that comes back as equal when passed through other isolates.

class.name: ReceivePort
class.preview: Together with dart-isolate.SendPort, the only means of communication between isolates.

error.name: IsolateSpawnException
error.preview: Thrown when an isolate cannot be created.
